name: Premium Cotton White Mundu
description: High-quality pure cotton white mundu perfect for daily wear and special occasions. Features a comfortable texture and breathability.
careInstructions: Hand wash separately in cold water
longDescription: High-quality pure cotton white mundu perfect for daily wear and special occasions. Features a comfortable texture and breathability. Experience the unmatched comfort and elegance of traditional Kerala handloom. Woven by skilled artisans from Aluva, this mundu represents the rich cultural heritage of God's Own Country. The fabric is breathable, skin-friendly, and durable, making it perfect for our tropical climate.
